column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My dad really wanted to try this restaurant out and he had clients in from Amsterdam to take to dinner
column2: so there were 5 of us in all
column3: not a large number. He had made a reservation and we walk in
column5: and no table set up for five...so around ten minutes later
column6: they seat us in a passage-way area
column7: with my dad at the head of a table for 4
column8: so it was really crowded to begin with
column9: then we had the waitstaff and bussers etc. all squeezing past him every 5 seconds
column10: like the last table you would ever fill in a restaurant
column11: saved for those who did not make a reservation.
